posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this badboy for an upgrade to one of my lesser condition 1909 Obaks.  If you have a nice example (slabbed or raw) of any of the following 1909 Obaks and are interested in a trade, email me at:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]

Boyce (horizontal)
Carson
Ehman
Harkins
Hap Hogan (horizontal)
McKune
Murphy
Olson
Ornsdorff
Speas
Wiggs (horizontal)
